Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 101-489.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 912.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands to the town of Taos, New Mexico.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey the Old Taos Ranger District Office and Warehouse to the town of Taos, New Mexico. Requires such property to be used solely as a community center or for related public purposes.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands to the town of Taos, New Mexico.
